enter_youtube_channel_url: Enter YouTube channel URL or channel ID, like https://www.youtube.com/@xxxx or UCUGLols3-2y_rJZZsgRzray

no_feeds_available: No feeds available, please add a new feed
title_exclude_keywords: Title excludes keywords (exclude if contains any one)
description_exclude_keywords: Description excludes keywords (exclude if contains any one)
audio_quality_description: Leave blank to keep original quality; higher numbers mean lower quality.

no_episodes_found: No episodes found for this channel
no_episodes_found_for_feed: No episodes found for this feed
please_enter_valid_youtube_url: Please enter a valid YouTube channel URL.
please_enter_valid_feed_url: Please enter a valid feed URL.
confirm_delete_channel_tip: Are you sure you want to delete this channel? This action cannot be undone.
initial_episodes_channel: Download historical episodes (must be greater than or equal to current value)
historical_episodes_must_equal_to_or_gre: Historical episodes count must be greater than or equal to current value
channel_config_updated_and_add_history_e: Channel configuration updated; history episodes download task submitted. Please refresh the page later to view.
subscription_link_generated_success: Subscription link has been copied to your clipboard automatically
manual_copy_alert_title: This browser doesn't support auto copy
manual_copy_instruction: Please click the button to copy the subscription link:
old_password_validation: Old password must be at least 6 characters long
new_password_validation: New password must be at least 6 characters long
cookies_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è By using your account, you run the risk of it being banned (temporarily or permanently). Be mindful with the request rate and amount of downloads you make with an account. Use it only when necessary, or consider using a throwaway account.
cookies_instructions_link: üìí See instructions on how to export YouTube cookies
not_logged_in_or_expired: Not logged in or session expired, please login again.

video_quality_description: Leave blank for best available quality.
video_encoding_description: Leave blank for default; see docs for details on H.264/H.265.

dashboard_bulk_delete_failed: Failed to delete all completed episodes
